org.pikater.shared.database.views.base.values

Class AbstractDBViewValue<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pikater.shared.database.views.base.values.AbstractDBViewValue<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BooleanDBViewValue, NamedActionDBViewValue, RepresentativeDBViewValue, StringDBViewValue

    public abstract class AbstractDBViewValue<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract parameterized read-only or editable value with a method to store the changed value in database.

    • Nested Class Summary

        public abstract boolean isReadOnly()
        Is this value read-only?

      • updateEntities

        protected abstract void updateEntities(T newValue)
        Called when a new value is received. This method must do appropriate actions to update related entities but NOT commit them to database yet. To commit, the commitEntities() is used.

      • commitEntities

        protected abstract void commitEntities()
        Called to store changes made by updateEntities(Object) to database.
